channel.title: Need help with setting Ip in client.java
channel.description:
Hey guys, so I know how to change the ip and all of that. And since im hosting the server I need my ip set to 0.0.0.0 and for players they need it to my no ip address.
Ok so i am running the server off my laptop.. Im trying to set up the client on my desktop but it wont connect.
Ips ive tryed on the desktop: My no -ip 0.0.0.0 127.0.0.1
What ip do i need to enter? It wont connect and yes i am compiling after i edit!

item.title: Need help with setting Ip in client.java
item.dc:creator: @Shadow742000 Shadow742000
item.description:
@Shadow742000 wrote:

ive been asking this question for 4 weeks, noone has helped me fix it yet…

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with setting Ip in client.java
item.dc:creator: @Djent Djent

@Djent wrote:

No no it works on my computer and everybody elses the problem is that he is on the same network so what would i put in, nothing is working?

item.source: Need help with setting Ip in client.java

item.title: Need help with setting Ip in client.java
item.dc:creator: @grace438 grace438
item.description:
@grace438 wrote:

In your client.java there will be 2 or more places to put your ip in. Say your no-ip is Moparscape.no-ip.org, then you search in client java for the 0.0.0.0 or w.e else it maybe and replace it. Also make sure you have the actuall ip turned on in your no-ip DUC. If you still cant coonect, then im afraid its probably another problem which is resorting in no connection. I hope this helped.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with setting Ip in client.java

Hey guys, so I know how to change the ip and all of that. And since im hosting the server I need my ip set to 0.0.0.0 and for players they need it to my no ip address.

Ok so i am running the server off my laptop… Im trying to set up the client on my desktop but it wont connect.

Ips ive tryed on the desktop:
My no -ip
0.0.0.0
127.0.0.1

What ip do i need to enter? It wont connect and yes i am compiling after i edit!
